items.sentence: Tom and his wife wanted to have a child before they were too old.
Tom bought a bag of apples and he ate a third of them in one day.
Tom came back from Boston a week earlier than we expected him to.
Tom probably thought I was going to Boston with him next weekend.
Tom promised not to tell anyone how much we bought our house for.
Tom put his money in the box, and then put the box in the drawer.
Tom remembered how beautiful Mary had been when he first met her.
Tom took shelter under the tree, hoping he wouldn\'t get too wet.
Tom usually teaches French, but this year he\'s teaching English.
This looks like it might be the weapon that was used to kill Tom.
